text: Humberto Luiz Gomes da Silva, also known simply as Humberto (born February 7, 1995), is a Brazilian professional basketball player for Corinthians of the Novo Basquete Brasil (NBB) from Brazil. ==Professional career== ===Flamengo=== On 7 July 2016, Flamengo announced the signings of Humberto and Ricardo Fischer, as part of the club's new signings for the NBB's 2016–17 NBB. ==NBB career statistics== ===Regular season=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center;" !
